verbLexeme: 1. To kill someone by tying a rope around their neck and taking away the support from under their feet so that they hang in the air. English = hang.
nominalLexeme: 1. The practice of executing people by tying a rope around their neck and taking away the support from under their feet so that they hang in the air. English = hanging.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: pulling on something around the neck.
